segments.text: Janice , I can't find the document I was working on last month . Can you help me to look for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Susan , I'm sorry . Did you look up those files I requested ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I still can not find it . Maybe it is in this cabinet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't find the files you request , even though I checked all the cross-references . I don't think it's there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sure that document was filed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me check again under a different heading .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea ! It seems that I asked you to put it in Nova's files .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe that's why I couldn't find it . All the documents on Nova are filed under ' V ' .
segments.speaker: S2
